metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28772 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.13.3. lib/seq_buf.chas a seq_buf_putmem_hex buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
